summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to Burlington Northern Santa Fe by Ordinance 118562 to locate, lay down, construct, maintain and operate standard gauge railway tracks in, upon, along and across 20th Avenue West and West Armory Way by amending Sections 1 and 5 of the ordinance to correct the name to The Burlington Northern and Santa Fe Railway Company, and Section 13 to extend the time for acceptance of the ordinance.
